firstTime.welcome: Looks like you are using the app for the first time.
firstTime.one:
A config file was created with default settings.
You can change them manually, %s :)

operatingMode.message: Which operating mode do you want to use?
operatingMode.standaloneDescription: Does not communicate with the server at all.
operatingMode.serverDescription: Sends the keys to the server automatically.

workingMode.message: Which working mode do you want to use?
workingMode.autoDescription: Creates a project and 100 keys automatically.
workingMode.manualDescription: Asks you what to do step by step.

keys.message: How many keys do you want to create?

save.message: Do you want to save the created keys in a new file?
save.saved: The keys have been successfully saved in the file "%s".

project.message: Do you want to create a new project (yes) or use an existing one (no)?

id.message: What is the project Id of the existing project?
id.invalid: The project Id is invalid. Please try again.

gcloud.quotaExceeded: You have exceeded your project quota. Please use a different Google account.

cli.failed: Seems like you don't have %s installed. Please install it and try again.

logout.ongoing: Logging out of all Google accounts...
logout.done: Logged out of all Google accounts.

login.failed: You took too long to log in. Operation cancelled.

api.enabled: The %s API is now enabled and ready to use.

keys.failed: The creation of the key %s has failed. Report the following error to rdx.

errors.offline: Seems like the API is offline. Please report this issue to rdx.
errors.forbidden:
Seems like your token has been revoked. You are not allowed to use gdrive-master anymore.
If you think this is mistake, please report this issue to rdx.

errors.stacktrace: The stacktrace has been saved to %s. Please report this issue to rdx.
errors.noStacktrace: The stacktrace could not be saved.
